channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- StruxureWare Data Center Expert
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- StruxureWare Data Center Expert

item.title: CVE-2021-22795|2024-08-03T18:51:07.444Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description: A CWE-78 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability exists that could cause remote code execution when performed over the network. Affected Product: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.8.1 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2021-22794|2024-08-03T18:51:07.441Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description: A CWE-22 Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability exists that could cause remote code execution. Affected Product: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.8.1 and prior)
